problem_text_cn: 如图,测得BD=120m,DC=60m,EC=50m,则小河宽AB的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the measured BD = N_0, DC = N_1, EC = N_2, then the length of the small river width AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠ADB=∠EDC,∠ABC=∠ECD=90°,∴△ABD~△ECD,∴\frac{AB}{EC}=\frac{BD}{CD}∴AB=\frac{BD×EC}{CD}=\frac{120×50}{60}=100(米).则两岸间的大致距离为100米.故选:D.
raw_comment: 本题考查相似三角形的应用;用到的知识点为:两角对应相等的两三角形相似;相似三角形的对应边成比例.
